abstract: report : ben affleck is back in treatment for alcohol addiction .
article: ben affleck is continuing to receive treatment for his alcohol addiction . a source close to the 45-year-old actor tells us weekly that `` ben 's main priorities have never wavered '' and that `` he 's focused on his family and spending time with lindsay . '' the source notes , `` dealing with this disease is something he 'll have to work on for the rest of his life and he remains focused on it . '' affleck confirmed in march that he had gone back to treatment for his issues with alcohol and drugs . in a statement released on facebook after completing his initial 2017 stint , the batman of the dc films said , `` i have completed treatment for alcohol addiction ; something i 've dealt with in the past and will continue to confront . ''

`` i want to live life to the fullest and be the best father i can be , '' he continued . `` i want my kids to know there is no shame in getting help when you need it , and to be a source of strength for anyone out there who needs help but is afraid to take the first step . '' the `` justice league '' actor went on saying that he 's `` lucky to have the love of my family and friends , including my co-parent , , who has supported me and cared for our kids as i 've done the work i set out to do . ''

he concluded his post , `` this was the first of many steps being taken towards a positive recovery . '' however , affleck was spotted drinking with shookus when attending hbo 's emmy after-party at pacific design center in weho in september . the actor allegedly `` ordered a water at the bar , '' but once he joined his `` saturday night live '' producer girlfriend and actor larry david , he traded his water for `` a short glass filled with whiskey and coke . '' an onlooker said , `` lindsay may not know it , but she 's enabling him . ''
